entry.title: Re @CathieDWood Passive/index investment is simply an amplifier of active investment. If active investment signal degrades in quality, passive is prop...
entry.summary: Re @CathieDWood Passive/index investment is simply an amplifier of active investment. If active investment signal degrades in quality, passive is proportionately impacted. Also, if there are very few actual active investors, their decisions can greatly increase company valuation volatility.
